newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Central bank dollar/rouble rates 5550/5590 FXSU.
newsitem.headline: Central bank dollar/rouble rates 5550/5590 FXSU.

text.p: The Russian Central Bank said it had set 5550/5590 roubles per dollar as its bid and offer rates for its operations on the currency market on Sunday.
The official rate for Monday will be 5570.
On Tuesday, December 31, the bid/offer rates were 5520/5600, with the official dollar rate 5560 from Wednesday.
The Central Bank announces daily bid/offer dollar/rouble rates for its currency operations. The midpoint of these rates is the official dollar/rouble rate for the following day.
